actions.label: Polite ask if they have
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">%repeatVariation('You wouldn't have  %subject% perchance?', 'Do you have  %subject%?')%</line>

actions.label: Demand ask if they have
actions.performance: <line s="%X%"> %repeatVariation('Give me the %subject%!', 'I demand the %subject%'. Now.)%</line>

actions.label: Don't have
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">I'm afraid I don't have  %subject%. I'm sorry.</line>

Have but say they don't.line: <line s="%X%">I'm afraid not.  %subject% is really hard to come by.</line>

Polite ask for.line: <line s="%X%">Are you sure? I would really like %subject%.</line>

actions.label: Give for free
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">It is my pleasure to give it to you. It's a gift.</line>

actions.label: Politely ask for something in exchange
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">If you have something to give in return I would be most grateful.</line>

actions.label: Irritated ask for something in return
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">Well, these don't come for free. You must give me something in return. </line>

actions.label: Politely refuse
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">I'm afraid I can't part with %subject%. I'm sorry.</line>

actions.label: Angrily refuse request
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">Never! %subject% is mine, and it stays mine!</line>

actions.label: Polite refuse to acquire
actions.performance: <line s="%X%">There is always a cost. It's just too high. I can't accept it I'm afraid, not this time. </line>
